item.description: Trailblazers will be hosting an "Adventure in Cooking" night, this is where the men teach the women how to "cook". Everyone needs to bring a "potluck" food item to the event to share in case there is not enough men who know how to cook! Men; I have enough minor ingredients in my home to help you along in preparing your dish, but please bring along any other necessary food items. Also we will be playing some single social interaction games. So come out and have fun, eat a lot and meet plenty of new people. If you have any questions don't hesitate to contact me at: 603-312-6735. Thanks. Peter.
item.why: Well everyone know how good men are at "cooking: so come out and enjoy their cooking!

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Adventure in Cooking Night!
